scripts.redis:down: docker stop redis_benchmark; docker rm redis_benchmark
scripts.json10: concurrently 'yarn start' 'yarn wait-for-api; yarn autocannon 10 json' --kill-others
scripts.msgpack10: concurrently 'yarn start' 'yarn wait-for-api; yarn autocannon 10 msgpack' --kill-others
scripts.json100: concurrently 'yarn start' 'yarn wait-for-api; yarn autocannon 100 json' --kill-others
scripts.msgpack100: concurrently 'yarn start' 'yarn wait-for-api; yarn autocannon 100 msgpack' --kill-others
scripts.json1k: concurrently 'yarn start' 'yarn wait-for-api; yarn autocannon 1k json' --kill-others
scripts.msgpack1k: concurrently 'yarn start' 'yarn wait-for-api; yarn autocannon 1k msgpack' --kill-others
scripts.json10k: concurrently 'yarn start' 'yarn wait-for-api; yarn autocannon 10k json' --kill-others
scripts.msgpack10k: concurrently 'yarn start' 'yarn wait-for-api; yarn autocannon 10k msgpack' --kill-others
scripts.json100k: concurrently 'yarn start' 'yarn wait-for-api; yarn autocannon 100k json' --kill-others
scripts.msgpack100k: concurrently 'yarn start' 'yarn wait-for-api; yarn autocannon 100k msgpack' --kill-others
